results.name: Series expansion of the elliptic function sqrt(k) = theta_2/theta_3 in powers of q^(1/4).
comment: It appears that a(n) = 2 * A208933(n) - A212318(n) for n>0. - _Thomas Baruchel_, May 14 2018
reference: N. J. Fine, Basic Hypergeometric Series and Applications, Amer. Math. Soc., 1988; Eq. (34.3).
xref: See A127392 for another version. Dividing by 2 gives A079006. Cf. A001936, A001938.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 31 2007
